title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release 1 Jun - Tata Motors May 2025 sales: 70,187 units, down 9% YoY; PV sales down 11%, CV sales down 5%.
date: 1 Jun - Tata Motors May 2025 sales: 70,187 units, down 9% YoY; PV sales down 11%, CV sales down 5%.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation 28 May - Scheduled analyst and institutional investor meetings on June 2, 2025, by Tata Motors.
date: 28 May - Scheduled analyst and institutional investor meetings on June 2, 2025, by Tata Motors.

title: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Regarding Letter Dispatched To The Shareholders Of The Company 24 May - Tata Motors dispatched letters for FY25 Annual Report access and AGM details; includes dividend and e-voting dates.
date: 24 May - Tata Motors dispatched letters for FY25 Annual Report access and AGM details; includes dividend and e-voting dates.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication 24 May - Copies of newspaper advertisement pertaining to the 80th AGM of the Company.
date: 24 May - Copies of newspaper advertisement pertaining to the 80th AGM of the Company.

title: Business Responsibility and Sustainability Reporting (BRSR) 24 May - Tata Motors files FY24-25 Business Responsibility and Sustainability Report as per SEBI regulations.
date: 24 May - Tata Motors files FY24-25 Business Responsibility and Sustainability Report as per SEBI regulations.
